attributes.action: restrict young drivers to 1000cc and 50 bhp for 2 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
restrict young drivers to 1000cc and 50 bhp for two years,once they have passed a basic test for A roads only.They are then restricted to carry one passenger only until they have completed a part two test which will increase the cc of the vehical to 1100cc and 65 bhp.
Then they must take lessons and a two part test for motorway driving in day light and also at night.only then  can they be allowed to have a full driving liecence.If they are caught breaking the above laws they will have thier cars conficated and baned for 2 years then start all over again.
This action will stop the dangerous and deadly practice of racing on public highways and stop the unecessary deaths of our young people
